verses.text: \w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* be \w overtaken|strong="G4301"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w fault|strong="G3900"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*, \w restore|strong="G2675"\w* such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w*; \w considering|strong="G4648"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* be \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w*.

Bear \w ye|strong="G0941"\w* one \w anotherâ€™s|strong="G0240"\w* \w burdens|strong="G0922"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w fulfil|strong="G0378"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* himself to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w*, when he \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, he \w deceiveth|strong="G5422"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G1381"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w prove|strong="G1381"\w* his \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* shall he \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G2745"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* shall \w bear|strong="G0941"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w burden|strong="G5413"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G2727"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w taught|strong="G2727"\w* in the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w communicate|strong="G2841"\w* unto him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w teacheth|strong="G2727"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* good \w things|strong="G0018"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G4105"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w*; \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G3456"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w mocked|strong="G3456"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w soweth|strong="G4687"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* shall \w he|strong="G2325"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w soweth|strong="G4687"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w shall|strong="G2325"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w tha|strong="G3588"\w*t \w soweth|strong="G4687"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w shall|strong="G2325"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* let \w us|strong="G1573"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w weary|strong="G1573"\w* in \w well|strong="G2570"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* in \w due|strong="G2398"\w* \w season|strong="G2540"\w* we shall \w reap|strong="G2325"\w*, if we \w faint|strong="G1590"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w opportunity|strong="G2540"\w*, let us \w do|strong="G2038"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* them who \w are|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w household|strong="G3609"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

Ye \w see|strong="G1492"\w* how \w large|strong="G4080"\w* a \w letter|strong="G1121"\w* I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* with mine \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

As many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* to make a fair \w shew|strong="G2146"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w they|strong="G3778"\w* \w constrain|strong="G0315"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*; \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* they should suffer \w persecution|strong="G1377"\w* for the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* are \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* to \w have|strong="G4059"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5212"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* God forbid \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w I|strong="G1698"\w* should \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, \w save|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* is \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* unto the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w availeth|strong="G2480"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* according to \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w*, \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \add be\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

From \w henceforth|strong="G3064"\w* \w let|strong="G3930"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w trouble|strong="G2873"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w bear|strong="G0941"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* the \w marks|strong="G4742"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
